name: Atulos Online
description: Atulos Online is a free to play 2D medieval MMORPG. You can choose from many different characters including Mage, Knight, Dwarf and Guardian. The story unfolds as a confrontation with the sorcerer Atulos draws ever closer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.3 GHz Intel, AMD or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game reminds me of really old runescape 10/10
Not for everyone. A simple nice RPG

I loved the game. Yes, the graphics are terrible, as are the controls. Yes, the music is repetitive to the point of madness. Even so, it gave me such a feeling of nostolgia that I couldn't help but love it. The simplicity is just beautiful. From what I've seen, the community is very friendly and helpful, as well.

the game is great for people looking to make progress while doing something else. or like just someone who wants a simple mmo rpg. i love the game because there's no complicated crafting or leveling system, it's just a 'you level up congrats' and some boost in strength or wisdom, and the way weapons work too, 'if it costs more, it's better'. simple but its very pleasing. it's true not for people who like next gen graphics but its worth to give a shot. i am probably gonna buy premium when i make it to higher levels ahhahhaha lvl 30 as of now.

nice game brings back childhood memory of those skybox 80's rpgs enemy's emensly hard at 2nd dungeon and need high quality and priced sword or you will certaintly die but other than that actually really fun!

So i've binged this game since finding it, Simple as simple can get, do a dungeon move on to the next, Grind for dosh and levels and move on to the next, Rinces and repeat. Theres open PvP as well as something called Arena war's which have different mods for example they have an arched mode whereeveryone has to throw engy balls at one another, some arena games have a max level so people who are higher can still play but are reduced to that max level, ive bought preium so i can level up fast and it works rather well, have to see what else prem can do yet. but all in all it's a below avg game,Stupidly shocking graphics, but by far the best community i've seen on any game, Very helpful vets of the game. so if you're looking for a chilled out game this would be it
Great community Simplistic game play Good for if you just want to pick up and play. Although there is much grinding the community and their antics make time fly by.

Atulos Online is free to play 2D medieval MMORPG with isogonical map. It worked, looked ok, sounded ok, played ok. Simple controls, has instructions website. Can be multiple players in dungeon. Has a retro look and old school gameplay, is a ten year old game. Has multiple classes, but each character is a separate account. Try it, if you like older games.  For more info:         YouTube™ Video:  Atulos Online Review

At first i did not exepct much from the game, i only liked the art style, but within 10 mins of me and my friend playing, we are hooked! The simple retro RPG style is amazing, there is slight room for improvement like when you walk into a wall it sometimes glitches but the game is like 2 days old so what can i say. Utterly amazing, hit the nail right on the head, this is amazing and i will probably buy the Premier Edition because i love this so much. I recomend to anyone who likes grinding games and dungeon crawlers. Overall great game. 10/10.
A really fun time waster. A great simple game to play if you're just bored, and the community is really nice.
Atulos Online is a decent free to play game for its age, having launched in 2006. If anyone can look at the pics and think to themselves 'that looks like a game I want to try', it probobly is.
You can name your character DickWeed and not get banned. 10/10

I used to play this back in 2007, and now I see that it's on Steam. Atulos Online is a fun experience with an amazing lifetime premiere edition that will never be revoked. The game has been maintained since 2007 and has overall made good progress since then from what I see.

I don't mind the overall game but Dungeons can be annoying because when you right at the bottom and you want to go up to have to go through all the doors using this character that loves to run into ♥♥♥♥ing walls.  But anyway I like the fact that I find it 'Oldschool' , And therfore it I am giving it a postive vote :) I wish there were more ( But a little bit better ) - Oldschool RPG's. Kinda reminds me of Runescape Classic as well haha.
Pretty basic, with an old school feeling but it doesn't do much to entertain longterm.
Alright so this game is pretty good. multiple saves... good variation... but theres not enough magic ... so i give it...  2.5/10
adsolutely trash game, bad grahpic, no animation at all and etc....
